import React,{useEffect,useState}from"react";import{getDocs,collection,doc,setDoc,serverTimestamp}from"firebase/firestore";import{onAuthStateChanged}from"firebase/auth";import{auth,db}from"./backend/firebase-config";// Your initialized Firebase config
import'./vacancies.css';import{jsx as _jsx,jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";function Vacancies(){const[user,setUser]=useState(null);const[vacancies,setVacancies]=useState([]);const[isLoading,setIsLoading]=useState(true);// üîπ Track authentication state
useEffect(()=>{const unsubscribe=onAuthStateChanged(auth,currentUser=>{setUser(currentUser);});return()=>unsubscribe();},[]);// üîπ Fetch all vacancies from Firestore
useEffect(()=>{const fetchVacancies=async()=>{try{const querySnapshot=await getDocs(collection(db,"vacations"));const fetchedVacancies=querySnapshot.docs.map(doc=>({id:doc.id,...doc.data()}));setVacancies(fetchedVacancies);}catch(error){console.error("Error fetching vacancies from Firestore:",error);}finally{setIsLoading(false);}};fetchVacancies();},[]);// üîπ Handle job application
const handleApply=async(vacancyId,e)=>{try{const applicationId=`${user.uid}_${vacancyId}`;const applyForm={userId:user.uid,vacancyId:vacancyId,appliedAt:serverTimestamp()};await setDoc(doc(db,"apply",applicationId),applyForm);e.target.textContent="–ó–∞—è–≤–∫—É –ø–æ–¥–∞–Ω–æ";e.target.style.backgroundColor="green";e.target.disabled=true;console.log("Nice");}catch(error){console.error("Error submitting application:",error);}};// üîπ Display all vacancy cards
const displayVacancies=()=>{return vacancies.map(vacancy=>/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"vacancy-card",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("h3",{children:vacancy.City}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("p",{className:"salary",children:["\u20B4 ",vacancy.Salary]}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("p",{className:"description",children:vacancy.About}),user&&/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("button",{onClick:e=>handleApply(vacancy.id,e),style:{backgroundColor:"#007bff",color:"white"},children:"\u041F\u043E\u0434\u0430\u0442\u0438 \u0437\u0430\u044F\u0432\u043A\u0443"})]},vacancy.id));};return/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("h1",{children:"Available Vacancies"}),isLoading?/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("p",{children:"Loading..."}):/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{id:"grid-container",className:"vacancy-grid",children:displayVacancies()})]});}export default Vacancies;
